comments.comments_text: Tim Siersleben (Heidenheim) goes over to take a corner kick after one of the defenders makes a good clearance.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) goes over to take a corner kick after one of the defenders makes a good clearance.

comments.comments_text: The resulting set piece from Hoffenheim is comfortably intercepted by one of the defending players.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The resulting set piece from [TEAM] is comfortably intercepted by one of the defending players.

comments.comments_text: Jan-Niklas Beste (Heidenheim) is going to take the penalty!
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is going to take the penalty!

comments.comments_text: A good clearance by a defender means the corner comes to nothing for Heidenheim.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: A good clearance by a defender means the corner comes to nothing for [TEAM].

comments.comments_text: Marius Bulter (Hoffenheim) sees a yellow card. He should be more careful because one more challenge like that could result in a red card.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) sees a yellow card. He should be more careful because one more challenge like that could result in a red card.

comments.comments_text: Jan-Niklas Beste (Heidenheim) takes a wonderful free kick and curls the ball into the top left corner with an absolutely phenomenal strike!
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes a wonderful free kick and curls the ball into the top left corner with an absolutely phenomenal strike!

comments.comments_text: The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to Hoffenheim.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to [TEAM].

comments.comments_text: Hoffenheim failed to take advantage of the corner as the opposition's defence was alert and averted the threat.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] failed to take advantage of the corner as the opposition's defence was alert and averted the threat.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Eren Dinkci (Heidenheim) was quite harsh and Robert Hartmann didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) was quite harsh and [REFEREE] didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: The game is interrupted. Kevin Akpoguma (Hoffenheim) is given a yellow card. He has to be more careful now.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The game is interrupted. [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is given a yellow card. He has to be more careful now.

comments.comments_text: The ball is out of play. Heidenheim win a corner kick.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The ball is out of play. [TEAM] win a corner kick.

comments.comments_text: Heidenheim take the corner, but their hopes of scoring a goal end with a nice clearance by the defence.

comments.comments_text: A cross from a corner kick by Heidenheim is too strong and the ball goes well out of play.

comments.comments_text: We are about to witness a substitution. Robert Skov (Hoffenheim) is replacing Marius Bulter.

comments.comments_text: Substitution. John Anthony Brooks leaves the pitch and is replaced by Kevin Vogt (Hoffenheim).

comments.comments_text: Heidenheim force a corner. They send men into the box.

comments.comments_text: Marvin Pieringer (Heidenheim) makes himself enough space to connect with the resulting corner kick and produces a beautiful header which goes inside the left post.

comments.comments_text: Here is a change. Grischa Promel is going off and Pellegrino Matarazzo gives the last tactical orders to Finn Ole Becker (Hoffenheim).

comments.comments_text: A corner kick by Hoffenheim is thwarted by the well prepared Kevin Muller (Heidenheim).

comments.comments_text: The corner is swung in but Hoffenheim can’t take advantage as a defender sweeps the ball away.

comments.comments_text: Florian Grillitsch (Hoffenheim) violates the laws of the game and is shown a yellow card by the referee, but it could have been a straight red as well.

comments.comments_text: Spectacular goal! Maximilian Beier (Hoffenheim) brilliantly darts into the box to latch on to a cross and buries the ball into the bottom right corner, leaving the goalkeeper stunned!

comments.comments_text: Goal! Pavel Kaderabek (Hoffenheim) was in the right place at the right time to get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully rifles the ball low inside the right post. It's 2:2.
